SELECT TP.TRIP_NUMBER,TP.TRIP_ID,TP.TRIP_TITLE, TP.TRIP_AREA, TP.TRIP_START_DATE, tp.trip_end_date, nvl(tpr.trip_plan_apply,0) trip_plan_appry_status FROM TRIP_PLAN TP, TRIP_MEMBER TM, trip_plan_recommand tpr WHERE tp.TRIP_NUMBER = tpr.TRIP_NUMBER(+) and TP.TRIP_NUMBER=TM.TRIP_NUMBER AND share_id=#{trip_id} and trip_type=1 UNION select tp.*, nvl(tpr.trip_plan_apply,0) trip_plan_appry_status from TRIP_PLAN tp, trip_plan_recommand tpr where tp.TRIP_NUMBER = tpr.TRIP_NUMBER(+) and trip_id=#{trip_id}

select tc.chatting_content, to_char(tc.chatting_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') as chatting_date ,tc.chatting_name, tc.trip_number ,m.member_profile_picture chatting_profile from trip_chatting tc, member m where tc.chatting_name = m.Member_id and TRIP_NUMBER = #{trip_number} and chatting_date between to_CHAR((select min(chatting_date) from (select * from trip_chatting where TRIP_NUMBER = #{trip_number} order by chatting_date desc ) where RowNum <= 10), 'YYYY/MM/DD') and to_CHAR((select min(chatting_date)+1 from (select * from trip_chatting where TRIP_NUMBER = #{trip_number} order by chatting_date desc ) where RowNum <= 10)+2, 'YYYY/MM/DD') order by chatting_date asc
